author: Bonnie L
title: Right in the center of NYC happenings-Times Sq.
text: I have taken all nine of my grandchildren to NYC when they each reached the age of ten years. They picked the show they wanted to see and misc. other attractions, but always we walked across Brooklyn bridge, visited the Empire state Building, Rockefeller Center, 9/11 Memorial, Wall St. bull, ST Patrick's Cathedral and Statue of Liberty; with this last trip we were able to climb up to the crown, (grueling for a grandmother!!) And always dinner at the Marriott Marque "View" revolving restaurant. And of course plenty of Subway experience. Perfect all suites hotel for these trips!
